title: Grade 2 Activities
description: Building fluency with place value, operations, and measurement

levels.title: Numbers to 1000 & Place Value
levels.goal: Understand numbers to 1000, represent them in multiple ways, and compare and order numbers.
skills: Read and write numbers in standard, expanded, and word form
Understand that 10 ones = 1 ten; 10 tens = 1 hundred
Locate numbers on a number line

activities.title: Count to 1000 Trail
activities.description: Fill in missing numbers as you climb to 1000!

activities.title: Skip Count Hop
activities.description: Hop by 5s, 10s, and 100s!

activities.title: Hundreds Tens Ones Builder
activities.description: Build the number using hundreds, tens, and ones.

activities.title: Expanded Form Match
activities.description: Match the number to its expanded form.

activities.title: Compare 3-Digit Numbers
activities.description: Pick >, <, or = to compare.

activities.title: Order the Numbers
activities.description: Put numbers in order from least to greatest.

activities.title: Number Line to 1000
activities.description: Find where the number belongs on the number line.

activities.title: Round to the Nearest 10/100
activities.description: Round numbers to the nearest 10 or 100.

levels.title: Addition & Subtraction Within 100
levels.goal: Build fluency adding and subtracting within 100 using models, mental strategies, and regrouping.
skills: Add within 100 using strategies (break apart, make tens, add tens then ones)
Subtract within 100 (counting up, break apart, related facts)
Understand regrouping conceptually (ten ones â†” one ten)

activities.title: Add Within 100
activities.description: Use blocks to add two-digit numbers.

activities.title: Subtract Within 100
activities.description: Take away tens and ones to subtract.

activities.title: Regrouping Practice: Add
activities.description: Practice adding with regrouping.

activities.title: Regrouping Practice: Subtract
activities.description: Practice subtracting with regrouping.

activities.title: Add/Subtract on Number Line
activities.description: Jump by tens and ones on the number line.

activities.title: Make 100 Pairs
activities.description: Find pairs of numbers that make 100.

activities.title: Word Problems: Add/Subtract
activities.description: Read a short story and solve!

activities.title: Estimate then Solve
activities.description: Round to estimate, then solve the exact answer.

levels.title: Even/Odd, Equal Groups & Arrays
levels.goal: Notice patterns (even/odd) and build intuition for equal groups and arrays as repeated addition.
skills: Determine if a number is even or odd
Use repeated addition to find totals in arrays

activities.title: Even or Odd Pairs
activities.description: Make pairs to see if the number is even or odd.

activities.title: Build an Array
activities.description: Build an array with rows and columns.

activities.title: How Many in the Array?
activities.description: Count faster using rows and columns.

activities.title: Equal Groups Story
activities.description: Add equal groups to find the total.

activities.title: Skip Count Patterns
activities.description: Use patterns to skip count by 2s, 5s, and 10s.

activities.title: Odd/Even on Number Line
activities.description: Find even numbers on the number line.

levels.title: Measurement, Time, Money & Data
levels.goal: Measure length using standard units, tell time to 5 minutes, count coins, and read simple data displays.
skills: Tell and write time to nearest 5 minutes
Interpret picture/bar graphs and simple line plots

activities.title: Measure with a Ruler
activities.description: Measure objects in inches or centimeters.

activities.title: Compare Lengths
activities.description: Which is longer? How much longer?

activities.title: Add/Subtract Lengths
activities.description: Add and subtract measured lengths.

activities.title: Time to 5 Minutes
activities.description: Read the clock to the nearest 5 minutes.

activities.title: Build the Time
activities.description: Set the clock hands to match the time.

activities.title: Count the Coins
activities.description: Add coins to find the total.

activities.title: Bar Graph Questions
activities.description: Read the bar graph and answer questions.

activities.title: Line Plot Dot Game
activities.description: Make and read a simple line plot.

levels.title: Shapes, Attributes & Equal Shares
levels.goal: Identify and describe shapes and partition shapes into equal shares (halves/thirds/fourths).

activities.title: Name the Shapes
activities.description: Identify common 2D and 3D shapes.

activities.title: Sides and Vertices Counter
activities.description: Count sides and vertices.

activities.title: Faces, Edges, Vertices
activities.description: Count faces, edges, and vertices on 3D shapes.

activities.title: Compose the Shape
activities.description: Put parts together to make a new shape.

activities.title: Halves, Thirds, Fourths
activities.description: Split shapes into equal parts.

activities.title: Which Parts Are Equal?
activities.description: Choose if the parts are equal.

activities.title: Fraction of a Shape
activities.description: How much of the shape is shaded?

activities.title: Sort Shapes by Attribute
activities.description: Sort shapes by sides, corners, or type.
